source.name: Token Standards: Characteristics and Applications
source.instructions: Which of the following statements accurately describe token standards in blockchain technology? Select all that apply.

answers.answer: Token standards are mandatory rules that all blockchain projects must follow
Implementing a token standard ensures compatibility with existing wallets and exchanges
Token standards can specify functions that tokens should declare, even if not implemented
Different blockchain networks always use the same token standards
Token standards help in achieving interoperability between different blockchain systems

source.guidance: This question assesses understanding of token standards in blockchain technology. The correct options highlight key aspects: token standards ensure compatibility with existing infrastructure, can specify functions to be declared (even if not implemented), and contribute to interoperability. The incorrect options address common misconceptions: token standards are not mandatory rules, and different blockchain networks may use different standards. This question encourages critical thinking about the role and characteristics of token standards in blockchain ecosystems.
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT evaluate the characteristics and applications of different token standards
